title: My problem
body:
I have a serious problem.When a game starts ,lol throw me out from the game and then i must reconect  so i am banned or i dont have a good start in my game.I send the error and lol said that something go wrong with my video driver process.
   I am desperate please help me!

replies.body:
It kind of sounds like you might be having a mix of two problems at once from the sounds of it. Let's be sure to tackle these both, but they'll require different steps.

When you're getting disconnected, it's probably happening because some firewall or antivirus might be blocking your network from talking with our game servers. Do me a favor and try disabling those momentarily while playing League to see if that helps or not. You should also check through the other steps listed in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for steps on how you can better configure your network settings too!

On the note about those video drivers, you're going to want to find the latest graphics drivers and get those updated to make sure your PC is able to properly run the game. If you aren't sure how to get those updated, check out that step in this [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) as well.
